description: This table contains the Diagnosis information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: DX_ORP_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: DX_LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Laterality for the corresponding procedure in the diagnosis information


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default

columns.name: DX_PRIMARY_DX_ID
columns.description: The primary diagnosis associated with this procedure.

columns.name: DX_PROC_PANEL
columns.description: The panel to which this procedure belongs

columns.name: DX_CPT_CODE_2_ID
columns.description: The second CPT(R) Code for this diagnosis

columns.name: DX_CPT_CODE_3_ID
columns.description: The third CPT(R) Code for this diagnosis

columns.name: DX_QTY
columns.description: The quantity for this procedure-diagnosis combination.

columns.name: DX_PROC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The procedure type for this diagnosis


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
